Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-0624 affecting package grub2 for versions less than 2.06-14
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-0624 affecting package grub2 for versions less than 2.06-14. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package grub2 is earlier than 2.06-14, affected by CVE-2025-0624
